name: DIR BG No Ads
description: Finally the biggest Bulgarian news website www.dir.bg without heavy ads and little bit faster ;)!
additional_info:
Version 0.7 - Main section resized, side bar removed and new add areas removed
Version 0.6 - Top Banner removed
Version 0.5 - Banner removed
Version 0.4 - Consent removed
Version 0.3 - Fixed flash ad appearance
Version 0.2 - vaucher ads, add new anecdote annoying link removed, direct ad network spaces removed
Version 0.1 - banners removed in general
